events.name: Club Event - Elevator Pitch Workshop
events.description: Join ASCM Fanshawe Student Chapter in collaboration with Career Services for an Elevator Speech Workshop. Guest speakers include Zeinab Mcheimech, PhD and Christina Larke. Prizes and snacks will be provided!

events.name: Fall Career Fair
events.description: Annual Fall Career Fair featuring over 50 employers from various industries. Bring your resume and dress professionally. Great opportunity to network and explore career options.

events.name: Tech Talks: AI and Machine Learning
events.description: Industry experts discuss the latest trends in AI and Machine Learning. Learn about career opportunities and cutting-edge technologies. Q&A session included.

events.name: International Student Welcome
events.description: Welcome event for international students. Meet other students, learn about campus resources, and enjoy refreshments from around the world.

events.name: Wellness Wednesday: Stress Management Workshop
events.description: Learn effective stress management techniques during exam season. Free workshop led by wellness counselors. Light refreshments provided.
